mapper.insert:
select HCY_MN_EQUIPMENT_ID_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into HCY_MN_EQUIPMENT (Device_id,Device_category,Device_name,Device_Vendor,Device_model, Device_ip,Remote_protocol,In_network_manage,Ssh_username,Ssh_password,Ssh_prompt,Telnet_username, Telnet_password,Telnet_prompt,Telnet_username_prompt,Telnet_password_prompt,Ssh_port,Ssh_timeout, Telnet_port,Telnet_timeout,Remarks) values (#{deviceId},#{deviceCategory},#{deviceName},#{deviceVendor},#{deviceModel},#{deviceIp}, #{remoteProtocol},#{inNetworkManage},#{sshUsername},#{sshPassword},#{sshPrompt}, #{telnetUsername},#{telnetPassword},#{telnetPrompt},#{telnetUsernamePrompt},#{telnetPasswordPrompt}, #{sshPort},#{sshTimeout},#{telnetPort},#{telnetTimeout},#{remarks})
mapper.select: select Device_id,Device_category,Device_name,Device_Vendor,Device_model, Device_ip,Remote_protocol,In_network_manage,Ssh_username,Ssh_password,Ssh_prompt,Telnet_username, Telnet_password,Telnet_prompt,Telnet_username_prompt,Telnet_password_prompt,Ssh_port,Ssh_timeout, Telnet_port,Telnet_timeout,Remarks from HCY_MN_EQUIPMENT where Device_id = #{deviceId}

select Device_id,Device_category,Device_name,Device_Vendor,Device_model, Device_ip,Remote_protocol,In_network_manage,Ssh_username,Ssh_password,Ssh_prompt,Telnet_username, Telnet_password,Telnet_prompt,Telnet_username_prompt,Telnet_password_prompt,Ssh_port,Ssh_timeout, Telnet_port,Telnet_timeout,Remarks from HCY_MN_EQUIPMENT where Device_category = #{deviceCategory,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
